content.div:
Lindsay Lohan and Kim Kardashian have been pals for years, and it looks like Lohan’s Mean Girls role may have rubbed off on the busty brunette.

The reality star reportedly took aim at a former nemesis during an Oscar after party on Sunday night.

According to JanetCharlton.com, Kardashian hasn't forgotten that time Moore called her out in the Twitterverse for everyone to see.

In case you haven't been keeping up with the who-hates-who of Hollywood, here's a little refresher. A couple of years ago, Kardashian posted a Tweet saying she was "big pimpin'" with her pals. Moore, who works with the DNA Foundation to end child slavery and exploitation, tweeted "@KimKardashian No disrespect I love a girls night out but a pimp and pimping is nothing more than a slave owner! ... if we want to end slavery we need to stop glorifying the 'pimp' culture."

At Elton John's Oscar soiree Sunday night, Charlton’s website reports Kardashian was overheard making fun of the fact that Moore was allegedly caught doing the street drug whip-it, and commented to her friends, “She called ME immature!”

Speaking of immaturity, Charlton claims Kardashian then requested Devo’s song “Whip It!” and "dedicated to Demi."

Keep it klassy, Kim.
